author: @orangutanklaus7035
text: I used to work as a Data analyst as well for 5 years. Comunication with your stakeholders is key. You have to truely understand their product, testing scenario or need for Information to give them what they need. It can help though to have someone along-side with you like a product owner who does the talking ;)
